t: DeWalt - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - In 1992, Black & Decker began a major effort to rebrand its professional quality and high-end power tools to DeWalt. In 1994, DeWalt took over the German woodworking power tool producer ELU, and used ELU's technology to expand their tool line. As of 2001, they manufacture and sell more than 200 hand power tools and 800 accessories. DeWalt is now a popular brand ...

t: What is the difference between Black & Decker and DeWalt tools? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 13): DeWalt is a much higher quality of tool compared to Black&Decker. I have personally used both in my business and DeWalt is far better. I believe the Black &Decker brand is more for the weekend warrior type person.

t: Stanley Black & Decker - DEWALT, CRAFTSMAN and BLACK+DECKER Win 2023 Popular Mechanics Yard & Garden Awards
